page.title: 18ATTITUDES: SCHOOL DINNERS
page.content: I like school dinners because they are good. You can have puddings after them. I don't pay for school dinners because my dad is out of a job. Three quarters of the children do not pay. Only twelve children out of a hundred and twelve in the school go home for dinner. My favourite school dinner is fish and chips and my favourite pudding is rice pudding and sultanas. I have seconds of fish and chips. Some people don't want their food so they give it to the others who are on our table. I like meringues too. I like the cream inside the meringues. I like soup. It is good soup. We used to have bread rolls for our soup but we don't now. I don't like pack lunch. Mummy has not got a job either so I don't pay. (by a ten year old boy).
